items.title: Riker
items.description: We finished our first sensor sweep of the neutral zone. They were just sucked into space. For an android with no feelings, he sure managed to evoke them in others.

items.title: Samuel L.
items.description: Now that we know who you are, I know who I am. I'm not a mistake! It all makes sense! In a comic, you know how you can tell who the arch-villain's going to be? He's the exact opposite of the hero. And most times they're friends, like you and me! I should've known way back when... You know why, David? Because of the kids. They called me Mr Glass.
